description:
Mesa 24.3 open-source graphics stack is now available with Vulkan 1.3 conformance for V3DV, updates for ANV, RADV, and NVK drivers, and improvements for several video games. Here’s what’s new!

The post Mesa 24.3 Open-Source Graphics Stack Adds Vulkan 1.3 Conformance for V3DV appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Mesa 24.3 Open-Source Graphics Stack Adds Vulkan 1.3 Conformance for V3DV
